name: FPS Range Practice
description: This is just my first time messing around on Unreal Engine and learning some stuff.  Your only objective is to shoot the spheres,  the score will be displayed on the top left side of the screen in red.  You can reset the game / level by pressing "E" while your aim is on the button like structure in the game (second screenshot). There's no VFX / soundtrack involved here as it's just a prototype.  Enjoy !
